thread.title: Kate and Gerry McCann hit out at ITV’s This Morning for broadcasting ex-cop's theories on what happened to Maddie
thread.title_full: Kate and Gerry McCann hit out at ITV’s This Morning for broadcasting ex-cop's theories on what happened to Maddie

title: Kate and Gerry McCann hit out at ITV’s This Morning for broadcasting ex-cop's theories on what happened to Maddie
text:
Opinion 'THIS IS PURE SPECULATION' Kate and Gerry McCann hit out at ITV’s This Morning for broadcasting ex-cop’s theories on what happened to Maddie 
Maddie's parents are 'baffled' by the TV show using Mark Williams-Thomas to voice his 'astonishing new theory' about her disappearance Exclusive
